page.title: 06FARMING SOUTH OF BO'NESS
page.content:
At{Stacks Farm}the fields are ploughed and cultivated and crops are grown.
At{Drum Farm}the fields are ploughed and cultivated and crops are grown.
At{North Bank Farm}where James Waddell is the farmer the fields are cultivated and crops are grown.
At{Kinglass Farm}the Pow family grow crops in the fields. They sell vegetables and other things in a shop which is being changed into a selfservice shop at the moment.The old farmhouse is used for bed and breakfast accommodation and the family live in a modern house.
At{Walton Farm}the fields are ploughed and cultivated and crops are grown.
